channel.title: Ideation & Prototyping Lab
channel.description: We are exploring and prototyping digital tools in order to collaboratively shape Berlinâ€™s future for citizens, the local government and the industry.

item.title: Cycling in Berlin visualised
item.description: Berlin by bike. How does the amount of cyclists evolve? Everyday the bicycle traffic is monitored through 26 bike counting stations. The Visulization explores the cycling patterns and reveals habits in a daily, weekly and month based rhythm.
item.content:encoded: Berlin by bike. How does the amount of cyclists evolve? Everyday the bicycle traffic is monitored through 26 bike counting stations. The Visulization explores the cycling patterns and reveals habits in a daily, weekly and month based rhythm.
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: Germany and Berlin's Universities
item.description: {Where do people the most people study in Berlin and Germany? How old is your university? The data of all universities and their metadata visualized.

item.title: Berlin's swimming lakes & rivers
item.description: Together with Kompetenzzentrum Wasser (KWB), Berliner Wasserbetrieben (BWB) and LaGeSo we have create a modern data-driven application, which informs Berlin's citizen on the current water quality for all outdoor swimming locations in Berlin.
item.content:encoded: Together with Kompetenzzentrum Wasser (KWB), Berliner Wasserbetrieben (BWB) and LaGeSo we have create a modern data-driven application, which informs Berlin's citizen on the current water quality for all outdoor swimming locations in Berlin.
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: Trust in Numbers
item.description: Data inherits an aura of truth. But there are many reasons to critically question data. We are giving a couple of examples to get started.
item.content:encoded: Data inherits an aura of truth. But there are many reasons to critically question data. We are giving a couple of examples to get started.
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: Mirror, Mirror
item.description: How can open data be made more accessible? One way is through new interfaces, such as our Magic Open Mirror
item.content:encoded: How can open data be made more accessible? One way is through new interfaces, such as our Magic Open Mirror
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: OpenData and Metadata
item.description: With the implementation of new laws and regulations for fostering the publication of open data in Germany the number of open data sets is steadly growing. In order to create sustainable data management structures and for increasing the data's machinereadability, accessability and findability good meta data is required. The new German standard for meta data DCAT-AP.de is a first step in the right direction.
item.content:encoded: With the implementation of new laws and regulations for fostering the publication of open data in Germany the number of open data sets is steadly growing. In order to create sustainable data management structures and for increasing the data's machinereadability, accessability and findability good meta data is required. The new German standard for meta data DCAT-AP.de is a first step in the right direction.
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: Berlin's spatial units
item.description: The city of Berlin is organised in various spatial units, from political district boundaries, to statistical life-world related spaces (LOR), to buildings.
item.content:encoded: The city of Berlin is organised in various spatial units, from political district boundaries, to statistical life-world related spaces (LOR), to buildings.
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: Berlin's Kitas
item.description: Kita-Suche should support parents to find the best Kita for their children. The innovative search- and filter-functionality as well as the map-based representation are driven by data from the city of Berlin. Through examples like this, the ideation and prototyping labs hopes to promote the benefits of open data for citizens and the city itself.
item.content:encoded: Kita-Suche should support parents to find the best Kita for their children. The innovative search- and filter-functionality as well as the map-based representation are driven by data from the city of Berlin. Through examples like this, the ideation and prototyping labs hopes to promote the benefits of open data for citizens and the city itself.
item.dc:creator: undefined

item.title: Mobile Air Pollution Sensor
item.description: Sense10 is a fully functional mobile prototype that measures air quality. The idea was to combine the Airrohr from the Luftdaten.info initiative with the LoRaWAN technology. We now sending the exact location of the LoRa Node in combination with the measurement data from the NovaPM10 sensor. This then gets visualized on a map to enable people to watch where a people on the streets can get problems in terms of air quality.
item.content:encoded: Sense10 is a fully functional mobile prototype that measures air quality. The idea was to combine the Airrohr from the Luftdaten.info initiative with the LoRaWAN technology. We now sending the exact location of the LoRa Node in combination with the measurement data from the NovaPM10 sensor. This then gets visualized on a map to enable people to watch where a people on the streets can get problems in terms of air quality.
